Title: Bamboo Innovation Centre at Angamali
Content: Bamboo Innovation Centre, a hub for providing impetus to the bamboo sector, will be inaugurated on the premises of the Kerala State Bamboo Corporation, Angamali, on Tuesday by Industries Minister E.P.
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Bamboo Innovation Centre, a hub for providing impetus to the bamboo sector, will be inaugurated on the premises of the Kerala State Bamboo Corporation, Angamali, on Tuesday by Industries Minister E.P.
